skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The dread carriages of the Ruinous hosts are more than just machines of war; they are symbols of status and power.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Chariot

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: These leonine beasts, with deadly stinging tails, are worthy mounts of a mighty Chaos Lord.

effects.description: Mount: Manticore

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos Dragons are anathema to the noble beasts of Caldor. They are now corrupted creatures ridden by malicious Lords.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Dragon

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: The dominion of Chaos grows larger each day; soon the whole world will be under its sway.

effects.description:
Undivided Authority: +2
	(Lord's army)

Undivided Authority: +3
	(Lord's army)

Undivided Authority: +4
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Few experiences match the satisfaction of shattering the bones of one's enemies.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.localised_description: The Chaos Gods grant almighty strength to the most fervent among their faithful.

effects.description: Ability: "Heroic Killing Blow"

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos bear the brunt of every attack with a stoic endurance, unburdened by the fear of pain.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for all Chaos Warrior, Chaos Knights and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kill, crush, destroy—these are the tenets of Chaos!

effects.description: Armour: +15
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.localised_description: Pain is a trivial price to pay in assuring the complete annihilation of Order!

effects.description:
Undivided Authority: +1
	(Lord's army)
Physical resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The brand of the Ruinous Powers is seared into the skin, a mark of absolute dedication to the cause of corruption.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Paragon of Ruin"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12
Ability: "Indomitable"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Stand or Die!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
